list.title: Cybersecurity Awareness Program
list.description: Training and campaigns designed to strengthen your organization's cybersecurity culture, reduce human risk, and promote safe digital behaviors.
list.content:
What is the Awareness Program?

The Cybersecurity Awareness Program by Cyberhub is designed to build an organizational security culture, aligning employees with best practices for data protection and incident response. Through interactive training, phishing simulations, and localized content, we empower the human factor as the first line of defense.

Program Components

  • Assessment of maturity level and human risk factors.
  • Interactive training customized by area or role.
  • Simulated social engineering attacks (phishing, smishing, etc.).
  • Impact measurement and continuous improvement.

Expected Outcomes

  • Increased awareness and accountability at all levels.
  • Measurable reduction of incidents caused by human error.
  • Compliance with ISO 27001 and other security audits.
  • Enhanced organizational culture and internal trust.

Strategic Value

Cybersecurity is not only about technology. 85% of incidents originate from human behavior. Our human-first approach ensures that security policies become part of your corporate DNA.

At Cyberhub, we help organizations turn awareness into action, integrating security, communication, and responsible digital behavior.

list.title: Cybersecurity Brand Positioning
list.description: Communication and branding strategies that position your organization as a trusted leader in digital security.
list.content:
Boost your brand in the secure digital world

In today’s market, companies that communicate trust and technological leadership gain a competitive edge. Our Brand Positioning service combines strategy, design, and technical storytelling to highlight your security expertise in an increasingly demanding digital landscape.

Included Services

  • Corporate visual identity design and development.
  • Strategic communication campaigns (web, social, press).
  • Digital reputation management and crisis communication.
  • Technical content focused on trust and leadership.

Expected Impact

  • Greater brand recognition in the tech and corporate sectors.
  • Lead generation through trust and visibility.
  • Strengthened perceived value of your solutions and digital culture.

Strategy + Technology = Trust

We combine design, storytelling, and data to position your brand with a professional and trustworthy voice in the digital ecosystem.

With Cyberhub, your brand doesn’t just communicate — it leads the conversation on security and digital transformation.

list.title: Cybersecurity Strategy and Management
list.description: Consulting and management services focused on digital transformation, organizational resilience, and cybersecurity compliance.
list.content:
Strategy, Governance, and Cyber Maturity

Our Cybersecurity Strategy and Management service guides organizations in designing and implementing master plans aligned with international standards such as NIST CSF, ISO 27001, and CMMI.

Focus Areas

  • Security maturity assessments and roadmap development.
  • Policy and governance model design.
  • Implementation of risk and control frameworks.
  • Definition of roles, responsibilities, and KPIs.

Organizational Benefits

  • Strengthened corporate governance in cybersecurity.
  • Improved risk-based decision-making and metrics.
  • Facilitated attainment of international certifications.

Expert Guidance

Our consultants work hand in hand with your team to ensure a sustainable management model that evolves with your operations.

At Cyberhub, we believe that a solid strategy is the foundation of a strong defense. We don’t just implement security — we help you govern it.
